so you can see the spirits in your HOUSE? elsewhere what? lol
  astral? travel?
  yah, ive NO clue
  thats my problem! LOL
  I am tryin to learn as much as i can, reading etc, but alot of it is very vague. Talking about techniques etc, but NOT WHY do it or WHY NOT do it. For all these subjects i am interested in. How to start, whats effective , what to be careful of etc etc etc.
  I am just looking for other ways of communication. Medium, is what i am interested in, i think that i was given this tool at a young age but have never used it, and tuned it out.
   
  amy

Andrea Carr <ACARR3@...> wrote:
              Hi Amy,
  
  The mirrors can be used to do that as well as see past lives or for meditation purposes. Some people don�t use it to just see the images on the mirror but use it at as a tool to help them get into a state for astral travel. It takes patience and the ability to focus and empty out your mind.
  
  Does that help at all? If you would more information let me know. I have scryed but haven�t done so in about a year.
  
  Andrea
